Package business.entities.monster

Class StandardMonster

java.lang.Object
business.entities.monster.Monster
business.entities.monster.StandardMonster
public class StandardMonster extends Monster
Class that represents a StandardMonster (Minion or Lieutenant), extending from Monster.

  • Constructor Details

    • StandardMonster

      public StandardMonster(String name, String challenge, int experience, int hitPoints, int initiative, String damageDice, String damageType)
      Constructs a StandardMonster object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the monster
      challenge - the challenge rating of the monster
      experience - the experience points awarded for defeating the monster
      hitPoints - the hit points of the monster
      initiative - the initiative value of the monster
      damageDice - the damage dice of the monster's attack
      damageType - the damage type of the monster's attack
